modName: Tutorial - How to create vampires with non-ungly faces in a simple way
summary: This tutorial describes how to create vampires with non-ugly face textures without the Neccessity to use esp-files or other stuff like that. It\'s very simple and easy to use.
descriptionHtml:
This tutorial describes how to create vampires with non-ugly face textures without the Neccessity to use esp-files or other stuff like that. 

It\'s very simple and easy to use.

The tutorial is available as a adobe pdf-file.

Enjoy!

[u][b]REQUIREMENTS:[/b][/u]

- Dawnguard-DLC

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34060/?]Improved Dawnguard Vampire Eyes - glowing and non-glowing[/url]
author: ViewtifulFlo
